dcterms:description: An infant brain MRI dataset with 90 term-born neonates, processed using an infant-specific computational pipeline. All cortical surfaces were mapped onto the spherical space and further resampled.
dcterms:title: Infant brain MRI dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Meng
G. Li
I. Rekik
H. Zhang
Y. Gao
W. Lin
D. Shen
dcterms:description: A dataset used to predict subject-specific dynamic cortical thickness maps during infancy from birth, utilizing sulcal depth and cortical thickness maps.
dcterms:title: Cortical thickness map dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Li
W. Wang
P. T. Yap
F. Wang

Y. Meng
P. Dong
J. Kim
F. Shi
I. Rekik
dcterms:description: A dataset containing sulcal depth and cortical thickness maps, used to leverage the relationship between sulcal depth and cortical thickness for prediction tasks.
dcterms:title: Sulcal depth and cortical thickness maps

dcterms:creator: G. Li
L. Wang
F. Shi
J. H. Gilmore
W. Lin
D. Shen
dcterms:description: A dataset for cortical surface reconstruction, used in the context of infant brain studies.
dcterms:title: Cortical surface reconstruction dataset
